trans-unit.source: Combining and Separating Records

target.mrk: Combining and Separating Records

seg-source.mrk: Picture 1

trans-unit.source: For this practice exercise, go to the new FamilySearch Web site at <hyperlink1>http://new.familysearch.org</hyperlink1> and sign in.

seg-source.mrk: For this practice exercise, go to the new FamilySearch Web site at <hyperlink1>http://new.familysearch.org</hyperlink1> and sign in.

target.mrk: For this practice exercise, go to the new FamilySearch Web site at <hyperlink1>http://new.familysearch.org</hyperlink1> and sign in.

trans-unit.source: Practice Exercises

seg-source.mrk: Practice Exercises

target.mrk: Practice Exercises

trans-unit.source: Do the following:

seg-source.mrk: Do the following:

target.mrk: Do the following:

trans-unit.source: Combining Records

seg-source.mrk: Combining Records

target.mrk: Combining Records

trans-unit.source: Click <run1>See Me and My Ancestors</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: Click <run1>See Me and My Ancestors</run1>.

target.mrk: Click <run1>See Me and My Ancestors</run1>.

trans-unit.source: On the pedigree, click the name of an ancestor.

seg-source.mrk: On the pedigree, click the name of an ancestor.

target.mrk: On the pedigree, click the name of an ancestor.

trans-unit.source: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Possible Duplicates</run1> tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Possible Duplicates</run1> tab.

target.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Possible Duplicates</run1> tab.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If there is a possible duplicate listed, click the check box for the record(s), and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) If there is a possible duplicate listed, click the check box for the record(s), and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>.

target.mrk: (Optional) If there is a possible duplicate listed, click the check box for the record(s), and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>.

trans-unit.source: Review the information.

seg-source.mrk: Review the information.

target.mrk: Review the information.

trans-unit.source: If this looks like the same individual, at the bottom, click an option with <run1>Yes</run1>. If not, click <run2>No</run2>.

seg-source.mrk: If this looks like the same individual, at the bottom, click an option with <run1>Yes</run1>.
If not, click <run2>No</run2>.

target.mrk: If this looks like the same individual, at the bottom, click an option with <run1>Yes</run1>.
If not, click <run2>No</run2>.

trans-unit.source: If there is another record to review, click <run1>Next</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: If there is another record to review, click <run1>Next</run1>.

target.mrk: If there is another record to review, click <run1>Next</run1>.

trans-unit.source: When you are done reviewing records, click <run1>Done</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: When you are done reviewing records, click <run1>Done</run1>.

target.mrk: When you are done reviewing records, click <run1>Done</run1>.

trans-unit.source: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Combine the Records</run1>. Records where you indicated Yes will be combined with this individual. Records where you indicated No will not be combined.

seg-source.mrk: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Combine the Records</run1>.
Records where you indicated Yes will be combined with this individual.
Records where you indicated No will not be combined.

target.mrk: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Combine the Records</run1>.
Records where you indicated Yes will be combined with this individual.
Records where you indicated No will not be combined.

trans-unit.source: Searching for Possible Duplicate Records

seg-source.mrk: Searching for Possible Duplicate Records

target.mrk: Searching for Possible Duplicate Records

trans-unit.source: To search for other possible duplicates, on the Possible Duplicates tab, at the bottom, click <run1>Advanced possible duplicates search</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: To search for other possible duplicates, on the Possible Duplicates tab, at the bottom, click <run1>Advanced possible duplicates search</run1>.

target.mrk: To search for other possible duplicates, on the Possible Duplicates tab, at the bottom, click <run1>Advanced possible duplicates search</run1>.

trans-unit.source: On the caution message, click <run1>Continue</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: On the caution message, click <run1>Continue</run1>.

target.mrk: On the caution message, click <run1>Continue</run1>.

trans-unit.source: Information about this individual is automatically filled in. Click <run1>Search</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: Information about this individual is automatically filled in.
Click <run1>Search</run1>.

target.mrk: Information about this individual is automatically filled in.
Click <run1>Search</run1>.

trans-unit.source: If no close matches were found, click <run1>Refine Search</run1>. Delete some of the information, such as parents’ names or spouse. Or use just the birth year or birth state or country. Then click <run2>Search</run2>.

seg-source.mrk: If no close matches were found, click <run1>Refine Search</run1>.
Delete some of the information, such as parents’ names or spouse.
Or use just the birth year or birth state or country.
Then click <run2>Search</run2>.

target.mrk: If no close matches were found, click <run1>Refine Search</run1>.
Delete some of the information, such as parents’ names or spouse.
Or use just the birth year or birth state or country.
Then click <run2>Search</run2>.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If you find one or more matches, click the check box for each record that matches, and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>. Follow the substeps in Step 4 above.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) If you find one or more matches, click the check box for each record that matches, and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>.
Follow the substeps in Step 4 above.

target.mrk: (Optional) If you find one or more matches, click the check box for each record that matches, and click <run1>Compare in More Detail</run1>.
Follow the substeps in Step 4 above.

trans-unit.source: Close the Search window.

seg-source.mrk: Close the Search window.

target.mrk: Close the Search window.

trans-unit.source: Combining Records of Other Family Members

seg-source.mrk: Combining Records of Other Family Members

target.mrk: Combining Records of Other Family Members

trans-unit.source: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Spouses and Children </run1>tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Spouses and Children </run1>tab.

target.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Spouses and Children </run1>tab.

trans-unit.source: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name. Notice the option to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3>. If the same sibling is listed twice, you can select this option to combine those records. This is a quick method for combining duplicate records for a family. <run4>Note:</run4> The combine options do not appear if there is only one sibling or only one spouse.

seg-source.mrk: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name.
Notice the option to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3>.
If the same sibling is listed twice, you can select this option to combine those records.
This is a quick method for combining duplicate records for a family.
<run4>Note:</run4> The combine options do not appear if there is only one sibling or only one spouse.

target.mrk: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name.
Notice the option to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3>.
If the same sibling is listed twice, you can select this option to combine those records.
This is a quick method for combining duplicate records for a family.
<run4>Note:</run4> The combine options do not appear if there is only one sibling or only one spouse.

trans-unit.source: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Parents and Siblings</run1> tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Parents and Siblings</run1> tab.

target.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Parents and Siblings</run1> tab.

trans-unit.source: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name. Notice the options to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3> is also available here.

seg-source.mrk: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name.
Notice the options to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3> is also available here.

target.mrk: Click the option button (<run1/>) in front of a name.
Notice the options to <run2>Combine with other siblings</run2> or <run3>Combine with other spouses</run3> is also available here.

trans-unit.source: Picture 9

seg-source.mrk: Picture 9

seg-source.mrk: ico_options_24.gif

target.mrk: ico_options_24.gif

trans-unit.source: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other spouses</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it. Click the tab <run3>Resolve Duplicate Spouses</run3>. Notice how you can also combine duplicate spouses here. Click <run4>Cancel</run4>.

seg-source.mrk: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other spouses</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it.
Click the tab <run3>Resolve Duplicate Spouses</run3>.
Notice how you can also combine duplicate spouses here.
Click <run4>Cancel</run4>.

target.mrk: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other spouses</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it.
Click the tab <run3>Resolve Duplicate Spouses</run3>.
Notice how you can also combine duplicate spouses here.
Click <run4>Cancel</run4>.

trans-unit.source: Picture 0

seg-source.mrk: Picture 0

target.mrk: Picture 0

trans-unit.source: ico_multi_spouses_36x48.gif

seg-source.mrk: ico_multi_spouses_36x48.gif

target.mrk: ico_multi_spouses_36x48.gif

trans-unit.source: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other parents</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it. Click the tabs <run3>Resolve Duplicate Fathers </run3>and <run4>Resolve Duplicate Mothers</run4>. Notice how you can also combine duplicate parents here. Click <run5>Cancel</run5>.

seg-source.mrk: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other parents</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it.
Click the tabs <run3>Resolve Duplicate Fathers </run3>and <run4>Resolve Duplicate Mothers</run4>.
Notice how you can also combine duplicate parents here.
Click <run5>Cancel</run5>.

target.mrk: On the pedigree, if the <run1>other parents</run1> button (<run2/>) is displayed, click it.
Click the tabs <run3>Resolve Duplicate Fathers </run3>and <run4>Resolve Duplicate Mothers</run4>.
Notice how you can also combine duplicate parents here.
Click <run5>Cancel</run5>.

trans-unit.source: Separating Records

seg-source.mrk: Separating Records

target.mrk: Separating Records

trans-unit.source: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Summary</run1> tab.

seg-source.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Summary</run1> tab.

target.mrk: On the individual’s information, click the <run1>Summary</run1> tab.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom, click <run1>Combined Records</run1>. A list of all the records that have been combined for this individual is shown. You can see the details for each record, including the contributor.

seg-source.mrk: At the bottom, click <run1>Combined Records</run1>.
A list of all the records that have been combined for this individual is shown.
You can see the details for each record, including the contributor.

target.mrk: At the bottom, click <run1>Combined Records</run1>.
A list of all the records that have been combined for this individual is shown.
You can see the details for each record, including the contributor.

trans-unit.source: If there are more than 5 records, click <run1>Next</run1> to see the next group of records.

seg-source.mrk: If there are more than 5 records, click <run1>Next</run1> to see the next group of records.

target.mrk: If there are more than 5 records, click <run1>Next</run1> to see the next group of records.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) If there was a record that you felt was not about this individual, click the check box for the record, and click <run1>Separate Selected Records</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) If there was a record that you felt was not about this individual, click the check box for the record, and click <run1>Separate Selected Records</run1>.

target.mrk: (Optional) If there was a record that you felt was not about this individual, click the check box for the record, and click <run1>Separate Selected Records</run1>.

trans-unit.source: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Yes</run1>.

seg-source.mrk: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Yes</run1>.

target.mrk: On the confirmation message, click <run1>Yes</run1>.

trans-unit.source: Indicate which record you would like to see. To see the record that you separated, click <run1>View this record on the family tree</run1>. Otherwise, click <run2>Close</run2>.

seg-source.mrk: Indicate which record you would like to see.
To see the record that you separated, click <run1>View this record on the family tree</run1>.
Otherwise, click <run2>Close</run2>.

target.mrk: Indicate which record you would like to see.
To see the record that you separated, click <run1>View this record on the family tree</run1>.
Otherwise, click <run2>Close</run2>.

trans-unit.source: Click <run1>Close</run1> to close the Combined Records window.

seg-source.mrk: Click <run1>Close</run1> to close the Combined Records window.

target.mrk: Click <run1>Close</run1> to close the Combined Records window.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) On your pedigree, check other ancestors to see if there are possible duplicates for each individual.

seg-source.mrk: (Optional) On your pedigree, check other ancestors to see if there are possible duplicates for each individual.

target.mrk: (Optional) On your pedigree, check other ancestors to see if there are possible duplicates for each individual.
